stockd.ta.ema



class Ema;
A type of moving average that is similar to a simple moving average, except that more weight is given to the latest data. The exponential moving average is also known as "exponentially weighted moving average".

this(ushort period = 12, bool sma = true);
Params:
ushort period period EMA is calculated for
bool sma use SMA instead of EMA for 0..period-1 values

double add(double value);
Evaluate next value

static void evaluate(ref const double[] input, ushort period, ref double[] output, bool sma = true);
Evaluate EMA for the whole input array
